name: Above tale - MSU project
description:
Game source: https://github.com/Aileck/Above-Tale

Unity 2020.3.0

Assets directory for the project:

https://www.coursera.org/learn/game-design-and-development-1/home/week/3

Base task:

  • 1. Make a basic 2D shooter game.
  • 2. Make some level.

My extension:

  • 1. Incorporate RPG system.
  • 2. Three selectable fighting styles.
  • 3. Boss Fight.
  • 4. Designed UI.
Above tale

Credits: Aileck (qykuzehibiki@gmail.com)
